TopicTitle: How to transfer demo saves to full version?

Articles.Content: Im getting ksp full version tomorrow (its my bday tomorrow! ) and i have a task (saving jeb from the ocean) and i cant with the demo. The demo is v0.18.3
Try dragging the save file. If that doesn't work, look in the save file itself and see if you can edit some parameters to make it compatible.
what he said, just copy the save file
ok thanks. ITS MAH BIRTHDAY!!!! im nervous if i will get it...
